name: NASA
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration!
startIntroPart2: We planned to settle on the moon for a long time, and today is the day. Let the second space race begin!
introduction: We were the first on the moon and we shall be the last!
declaringWar: You can't really resist the will of a superpower, y'know?
attacked: You have some courage. It won't last for long though.
defeated: Luck was on your side. Just wait for Mars.
afterPeace: Well, that went a little differenly than expected...

name: Roscosmos
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the Roscosmos State Corporation for Space Activities!
startIntroPart2: We planned to settle on the moon for a long time, and today is the day. Let the second space race begin!
introduction: We were the first to space, just that you know.
declaringWar: Nothing personal, we're simply estabilishing a new rule.
tradeRequest: We see you have some interests and we are willing to compromise.
